title: Group that opposed poem would advocate

content.question: People who disagreed at the time with the ideas expressed in the poem were most likely to advocate for which of the following government policies?

choices.label: Federal court decisions that made labor union strikes illegal
New laws to increase local control over filling jobs in the civil service
The passage of legislation to ban immigration from eastern Asia
Federal support to protect the voting rights of African Americans

content.answer: The passage of legislation to ban immigration from eastern Asia

topic.text: 6.9: Responses to Immigration in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
